title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 575.3 - Definitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 575.3 - Definitions

State Regulations
(a) College
community member. Every person who is officially affiliated with the College of

Environmental Science and Forestry. (b) Student. Any person who is registered at
the College of Environmental Science and Forestry for the purpose of attending
classes. (c) Subject premises. The

Syracuse campus of the State University College of Environmental Science and

Forestry. (d) Motor vehicle, vehicle. Every device in, upon, or by which any person or property is or may be
transported or drawn on a highway except devices moved by human
power. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
575.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
